alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Appomattox; Bedford; Campbell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Appomattox, northeastern Campbell, northeastern Bedford, and southern Amherst Counties and the City of Lynchburg through 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lynchburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lynchburg... Concord... Forest... Coleman Falls... Madison Heights... Boonsboro... and Riverville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
